productDetails.whatsappMessage: I'm interested in {quantity} unit{plural} of {productName} for {totalPrice}. Could you provide more information?
productDetails.productDescriptionText1: The {productName} is a premium {size} {category} TV that combines cutting-edge technology with elegant design. With its {resolution} resolution, you'll enjoy crystal-clear images with vibrant colors and deep contrasts.
productDetails.productDescriptionText2: This smart TV comes with a user-friendly interface that gives you access to popular streaming services, allowing you to enjoy your favorite movies, shows, and content with ease. The built-in Wi-Fi ensures seamless connectivity, while multiple HDMI and USB ports provide versatile options for connecting external devices.
productDetails.productDescriptionText3: Experience immersive sound with the integrated speakers that deliver clear audio for an enhanced viewing experience. The sleek design with minimal bezels not only looks modern but also maximizes your viewing area.

about.title: About SmartView Télé
about.subtitle: Connecting the world through innovative technology
about.storyText1: Founded in 2022, SmartView Télé began with a simple mission: to provide cutting-edge telecommunications products that enhance people's lives. What started as a small operation has grown into a trusted name in the industry.
about.storyText2: Our journey has been defined by innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction. We believe in creating products that not only meet but exceed expectations, setting new standards in the telecommunications market.
about.missionText: At SmartView Télé, we're committed to delivering innovative telecommunications solutions that connect people and enhance their daily experiences. We strive to:
missionPoints: Stay at the forefront of technological advancements
about.videoText: Watch this short video to learn more about SmartView Télé and our journey.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in telecommunications.

quality.title: Quality
quality.text: We never compromise on the quality of our products and services.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.text: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do.

contact.heroSubtitle: Have questions about our Smart TVs or need assistance? We're here to help you find the perfect entertainment solution.
contact.storeExtraDescription: My store is the second shop behind ABASS TRANSPORT S.B.T.A in MIRADOR ADJAME ABIDJAN.
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.whatsappText: For immediate assistance, you can reach us directly on WhatsApp. Our customer service team is available to answer your questions about our Smart TVs.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions about SmartView Télé
faqs.contactSupport: Our customer support team is here to help you with any questions about our products and services.

q1.question: What is SmartView Télé?
q1.answer: SmartView Télé is a provider of high-quality smart TVs and accessories based in Abidjan.

q2.question: Where is your store located?
q2.answer: We are located in Adjame, Abidjan at Rue Nimlin Fax-Clark, behind ABASS TRANSPORT S.B.T.A.

q1.question: Do you offer nationwide shipping?
q1.answer: Yes, we ship to all regions of Côte d'Ivoire.

q2.question: How long does delivery take?
q2.answer: Delivery usually takes 1-3 business days within Abidjan.

q1.question: Do you offer installation services?
q1.answer: Yes, we provide optional professional installation at your home.

q1.question: What is your return policy?
q1.answer: You can return products within 7 days of purchase with original packaging and receipt.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept mobile money, cash on delivery, and bank transfers.

q2.question: Can I pay in installments?
q2.answer: Currently, we do not offer installment payments.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Hear from our satisfied customers about their experience

entries.name: Jean Kouassi
entries.text: The quality of the Samsung QLED TV I purchased from SmartView Télé exceeded my expectations. The colors are vibrant and the customer service was exceptional. Highly recommended!

entries.name: Marie Diallo
entries.text: I bought an LG OLED TV for my new apartment and I am amazed by the picture quality. The team at SmartView Télé was very helpful in guiding me to choose the right model for my space.

entries.name: Ahmed Touré
entries.text: Great selection of smart TVs with competitive prices. The delivery was prompt and the installation service was professional. Will definitely shop here again for my tech needs.
